title: x/mobile/example/sprite: compiler error due to go.mobile/sprite: replace Sheet/Texture with Texture/SubTex, but example/sprite are not update
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
./make.bash

2. What is the full compiler output?
./main.go:79: too many arguments in call to eng.SetTransform
./main.go:84: eng.SetTexture undefined (type sprite.Engine has no field or method
SetTexture)
./main.go:88: too many arguments in call to eng.SetTransform
./main.go:91: eng.SetTexture undefined (type sprite.Engine has no field or method
SetTexture)
./main.go:95: too many arguments in call to eng.SetTransform
./main.go:102: eng.SetTexture undefined (type sprite.Engine has no field or method
SetTexture)
./main.go:104: eng.SetTexture undefined (type sprite.Engine has no field or method
SetTexture)
./main.go:117: too many arguments in call to eng.SetTransform
./main.go:138: eng.LoadSheet undefined (type sprite.Engine has no field or method
LoadSheet)
./main.go:151: too many arguments in call to eng.LoadTexture
./main.go:151: too many errors

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
go version devel +d8a3cc1714e4 Fri Nov 14 17:03:17 2014 +1100 darwin/amd64
